data.expected_result: the top bar should still be displaying fine
data.short_description: Issue of the very top bar displaying your time and battery percentage etc will disappear
data.steps_to_repro: - open iOS client then go to a channel where you can send images - press the file icon, press take photo using camera roll, then take the photo - once you’ve taken the photo, press “cancel” and once you go off the screen, the top bar will be gone
